C

checkStateToWait() - Method in class SimulationFramework.SimFrame
Determine how many times thread needs to wait based on state of simulation model.
clear - Variable in class SimulationFramework.AnimatePanel
clear the temporary markers and connectors from the current model, set all bots to their initial model state.

Connector - Class in SimulationFramework
Connector is used to draw lines between points on the simulation's canvas.

createBot() - Method in class Map
